PostException(String, String) - Constructor for exception com.threerings.riposte.server.PostException
Constructs a post exception with the supplied cause code string and qualifying message bundle.
PostListener - Interface in com.threerings.riposte.client
All Riposte service calls receive a PostListener optional argument at the end to allow the calling entity to find out about return values and failures.

All exceptions through by service methods are caught, with the message sent along the wire to requestFailed.
PostManager - Class in com.threerings.riposte.server
The main server-side class, PostManager is responsible for parsing requests from clients and seeing that the proper PostDispatcher is notified of the service call.
PostManager(Map<Integer, PostDispatcher>, String) - Constructor for class com.threerings.riposte.server.PostManager
Constructor for PostManager.
PostRequest - Class in com.threerings.riposte.data
An encapsulation of service call data, this is the main class to get sent over the wire.
PostRequest() - Constructor for class com.threerings.riposte.data.PostRequest
 
PostResultListener - Interface in com.threerings.riposte.client
